name: @baekho-lim/openclaw-secret-wallet
description: OpenClaw plugin for secret-wallet with selective inject and gated write tools

scripts.pack:smoke: TMPDIR=$(mktemp -d) && npm pack --pack-destination "$TMPDIR" >/dev/null && TAR=$(ls -1 "$TMPDIR"/*.tgz | head -1) && tar -tzf "$TAR" | grep -q '^package/dist/index.js$'
